This is the `README.qmd` file for navigating you through our project.

## Project Structure
The analysis is contained within the `Preliminary-results.qmd` file, which generates the final HTML report.

*   `Preliminary-results.qmd`: Main analysis script (Quarto).
*   `data/`: Contains all CSV files required for analysis.
*   `2025BGroup-phosphorusCO2.Rproj`: Rstudio project file.
*   `EucFACE_P_Analysis/`: The folder for all the files.
